Glass for Europe, the European association for Europe's manufacturers of building, automotive, and energy-solar glass.

goals__remit: AGC Glass Europe produces, processes and distributes flat glass for the construction industry (external glazing and interior decorative glass), the automotive industry (original and replacement glass) and solar energy applications and industrial appliances. Based in Louvain-la-Neuve (Belgium), it has over 100 sites throughout Europe, from Spain to Russia, and employs around 16,500 employees. AGC Glass Europe is the European branch of AGC Glass, the world’s largest producer of flat glass.
